instruction: theorem AP_3 {a b : ℝ} (f : ℝ → ℝ) (h₁ : ContinuousOn f (Icc a b)) (h₂ : (∫ x in a..b, (f x) ^ 2) = 0) : ∀ x ∈ Icc a b, f x = 0 := by sorry

initialize.expr: theorem AP_3 {a b : ℝ} (f : ℝ → ℝ) (h₁ : ContinuousOn f (Icc a b)) (h₂ : (∫ x in a..b, (f x) ^ 2) = 0) : ∀ x ∈ Icc a b, f x = 0 := by sorry
